com.android.server.location

Class ComprehensiveCountryDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.server.location.CountryDetectorBase
      • com.android.server.location.ComprehensiveCountryDetector

  • public class ComprehensiveCountryDetector
extends CountryDetectorBase
    This class is used to detect the country where the user is. The sources of country are queried in order of reliability, like
    • Mobile network
    • Location
    • SIM's country
    • Phone's locale

    Call the detectCountry() to get the available country immediately.

    To be notified of the future country change, using the setCountryListener(CountryListener)

    Using the stop() to stop listening to the country change.

    The country information will be refreshed every LOCATION_REFRESH_INTERVAL once the location based country is used.
